oai_dc:dc.dc:title: St. Peter's Cathedral
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “St. Peter’s Cathedral, Memphis, Tenn.” Color image.

“Miss Irene Bignardello -- Box 133 -- Paris -- Texas -- Dear Irene: - Rosalie spent -- Monday night and yesterday -- with us. everybody well -- but feeling the heat. -- yesterday and today have -- been warmer than last -- week -- Lula”
